attributes.action: Ban the import of single use and non recyclable plastics in the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details: When you see a Pilot Whale desperately hold onto her baby who died days ago from probable poisoning from our corrosive human ways and realise there are probably many more examples like this then you want action now and not in 2040!
attributes.background: If we cut the demand of these types of plastics then the supply should reduce too and force food producers to re think and start using materials such as metal and glass. Why should nature and all who share the planet with us be poisoned?
